app.title: Etherisc Flight Delay Protection
application_instructions: Enter airline, flight number, and departure date to get a quote for flight delay protection.
purchase_disclaimer: Purchase flight delay protection with <0>USDC</0> on the <1>Base blockchain</1>.
purchase_success: Protection for flight <0>{{carrier}} {{flightNumber}}</0> on <0>{{departureDate}}</0> is now active. <1 /> Policy ID: <0>{{policyNftId}}</0>
purchasing: Please wait a moment while we issue your policy
signing_request_1: Please sign the ERC20 permit. This authorizes the contract to collect the premium amount and issue the policy on your behalf.
signing_request_2: <0>Note</0>: This is a one-time authorization limited to {{symbol}} {{amount}}.
whitelisted_airports_explanation: Flights must depart from or arrive at one of these approved airports to be eligible for protection.
blacklisted_airports_explanation: Flights departing from or arriving at these blacklisted airports cannot be protected.

contracts.title: Flight delay contract addresses
contracts.stay_safe: Stay safe and always verify contract addresses from official sources before interacting with them!

field.flightNumber: Please enter a valid flight number (1-4 digits)

error.inconsistent_data: The flight data provided by the flight data service is inconsistent and cannot be used for protection purposes.
error.airport_not_whitelisted: Protection for flights from {{dep}} to {{arr}} is not available. Please choose a different flight. Refer to the <0>complete list of approved airports here</0>.
error.airport_blacklisted: Protection for flights from or to {{airport}} is not available. Please choose a different flight. Refer to the <0>complete list of approved airports here</0>.
error.purchase_protection_not_possible: To purchase protection, please connect your wallet, choose a flight and departure date and try again.
error.no_wallet_connected: Please connect your wallet to view policies
error.insufficient_balance: Your wallet balance is insufficient to purchase protection. Please top up your wallet and try again.
error.purchase_currently_not_possible: Protection for this flight is not possible at the moment. Please try again later.
error.purchase_failed: Protection for this flight could not be issued
error.switch_chain_first: Please switch to the correct network before purchasing protection
error.change_flight: Please choose a valid flight to continue
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error.not_enough_data: Currently not enough data available to protect this flight. Please try again in the future.
error.riskpool_full: No new flights can be protected right now, because the capacity of the risk pool is exhausted. Please wait until capacity is available again.
error.riskpool_not_enough_caoacity_for_flight: The capacity of the risk pool is not sufficient to protect this flight. Please wait until capacity is available again.

info.use_mobile_wallet_browser: For the best experience, open this page in a mobile wallet browser (e.g. Metamask).
